channel.title: [317] Omega Framework: #Netty
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sY7UPy5.png[/img]
[size=18pt]Media[/size] [SPOILER= Media] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ua4ktd2l0xck042/Screenshot%202014-07-13%2017.54.21.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[size=18pt]Credits[/size] [SPOILER=Authors] [size=8pt][I](Not in particular order)[/I][/size] [URL=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=630180]Carlos Sanchez-Aviles[/URL] - Netty work. [URL=https://github.com/blakeman8192]Blakeman8192[/URL] - Streambuffer Graham - Packet, ISAAC. [/SPOILER]
[size=18pt]Plugins[/size] [SPOILER=Plugins] 1- I took the time to write an almost finished login check system. [i](checks your username passowrd,account status, uid, client version, etc...) 2- Wrote a simple timer, that times how fast the server loads. [/SPOILER]
[size=18pt]Bugs[/size] [SPOILER=Bugs] None, as of now. [/SPOILER]
[size=18pt]Downloads[/size] [SPOILER=Download] https://www.dropbox.com/s/vef4q0dc557oy2l/Omega-1.2.zip [/SPOILER]
[/center]

item.title: [317] Omega Framework: #Netty
item.dc:creator: @Michael_P1 Michael P
item.description:
@Michael_P1 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:51, topic:544920”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=663798.msg4439083#msg4439083 date=1405966831]

I remember him as being a bit of a tard when he was still here, didn’t know he was even banned, lol. Thought he had just continued on his life like everyone else.

I was not banned…

1- I forgot the password.
2- I changed the email, I forgot what it was.
3- I also forgot the recovery question answer.

No you were banned, you were Project Amazed Carlos. The kid who claimed to have the two cousins working for Jagex ltd that were helping you program your server, lol. Believe me, after you got +100’d on that account I can remember banning a whole list of them that you had made to counter that. By all rules right now you deserve to be banned again on this account but Tom felt nice and didn’t want to let any of the mods reban you.
[/quote]

This account wasn’t banned m8.[/quote]

Um… yes it was idiot. Even if it wasn’t, you’re evading a ban like Ruby said which is against the rules.

Read full topic

Thomas is smarter than you and I combined, dunno where you got that he is an idiot from. (Assuming because he is a giant fudgeing troll)

item.title: [317] Omega Framework: #Netty
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

[quote=“lare69, post:39, topic:544920”][quote author=Ashi link=topic=663798.msg4436803#msg4436803 date=1405346604]
Considering that 99% of servers use PI which consists of both Mina and PI and use Netty 3. Yeah they do.

You shouldn’t argue about this anyway. It’s not like you used the docs to produce this. I frankly don’t care since you just copied how other people handled their networking.
[/quote]
yeah she’s right

I might be wrong on him stealing network maybe everyone’s looks pretty similar but Stuart released a rune-source that has netty.

oh yeah he did, doubt he stole it from that either because the netty implementation in that is fine

in your first thread you implied that synchronous IO was better than asynchronous NIO which pretty much justifies all the negative comments in this thread lol

also the person you copied netty from is “canownueasy” he’s an idiot lol stop following his tutorials and look and the docs. try again when you can explain and understand what you’re writing[/quote]

Thomas is smarter than you and I combined, dunno where you got that he is an idiot from. (Assuming because he is a giant fudgeing troll)

Read full topic

in your first thread you implied that synchronous IO was better than asynchronous NIO which pretty much justifies all the negative comments in this thread lol

item.title: [317] Omega Framework: #Netty
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“antiyou, post:36, topic:544920”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=663798.msg4436951#msg4436951 date=1405379832]

I’m sorry to DC9 for repeatedly coming back because I know how much of a pain it is to have to revisit threads as a moderator. How on earth can you possibly say to people “none of you know what to do”. You’ve made a runt of the framework, you’ve made a runt of yourself. Accept it and try to learn and move on. Stop putting yourself above others, you are not a programmer. You’re a retard behind a computer. Work on learning an actual programming language and maybe then you can come back and give people some form of pointers towards what “none of them know what to do”.

A wise old man once told me.

Ruby:

You’re not welcome on this thread.

I’d listen to him but ridding the forum of autistics is what I do best.

Personally IMHO I feel uncomfortable when people say autistic, its honestly not polite and I’d prefer if you used ‘special’ instead.

Yeah, but you can’t help an over uneducated autistic 16 year old kid though.

But its rude to call him autistic…
[/quote]

Yeah, I suppose, I guess I’ll stick with stupid little half-retarded Fuckhead.[/quote]
Alright, thanks friend :))))

Read full topic
